name: @tremho/gen-format
description: General formatting system; string, number, date, currency, (expandable)

scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run compile && tap --no-coverage ./build/test/*.test.js
scripts.test-direct: npm run clean && npm run compile && node build/test/DateFormat.test.js
scripts.doc: npm run clean && npm run compile && inchjs && cd build; tsccd ./; documentation lint src; documentation readme --readme-file ../API.md --markdown-toc false --section API src
